name: 20 secs Eclipse
description:
Curse to The City! Prohibition has been announced! All the wine supplies have been thrown into the sea, The Guarder is watching, and The Great Fest is coming. But there is a chance. 20 secs eclipse will happen soon. Eyes of The Guarder will be blind for this moment. Collect 20 barrels, avoid monsters, return to The Port before the eclipse ends.

Use arrow keys or WSAD - good luck!

Hint: Although there is a randomness in the game's mechanics, you can easily identify certain patterns which may be helpful when deciding in which order the barrels need to be collected.
